title: How to Buy Filters on VSCO on Android

steps.headline: Open VSCO.
steps.description: This app icon looks like a black circle made out of squares on a white background. You can find this app on either your home screen, in your app drawer, or by searching.

steps.headline: Tap the square button with a circle inside.
steps.description: This is the Studio button and opens a page showing all your pictures.

steps.headline: Tap Shop.
steps.description: This is in the upper left corner of your screen. A new page will open showing all the filters/presets that are available for purchase or free to own.

steps.headline: Tap the preset that you like.
steps.description: A new page for the preset will open, showing more images and more filters in the pack.

steps.headline: Tap Buy.
steps.description: This filter/preset will now be in your filters section of your editing tools!

text: Open VSCO. This app icon looks like a black circle made out of squares on a white background. You can find this app on either your home screen, in your app drawer, or by searching. Tap the square button with a circle inside. This is the Studio button and opens a page showing all your pictures. Tap Shop. This is in the upper left corner of your screen. A new page will open showing all the filters/presets that are available for purchase or free to own. Tap the preset that you like. A new page for the preset will open, showing more images and more filters in the pack. Tap Buy. This filter/preset will now be in your filters section of your editing tools!
